summary: Blue Origin is an American space company based in Washington. They make rocket engines and their own rockets, spaceships, and satellites. Blue Origin will help NASA's Artemis program by building lunar landers and received a $3.4 billion contract for this. They have four types of rocket engines. In 2016, they won a big award, the Robert J. Collier Trophy, for showing that rocket boosters can be used again. This makes space travel more efficient and safe.
title: Blue Origin
